relevant_findings.lung_crackles: diffuse coarse crackles at the lung bases
relevant_findings.creatinine_level: 1.3 mg/dL (higher than 1 year earlier at 0.8 mg/dL)

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood creatinine level increased from 0.8 mg/dL to 1.3 mg/dL over the course of 1 year.

relevant_findings.blood_pressure: decreased to 78/45 mm Hg after several hours

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Oxygen saturation worsened from 94% to 87% after 3 hours post-admission and shortness of breath increased.

relevant_findings.urine_output: maintained at 100 ml per hour with diuretics
relevant_findings.acidosis: mixed metabolic and respiratory acidosis developed

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood urea nitrogen and creatinine levels continued to rise, indicating worsening renal function.
The patient's kidney function progressively declined, leading to the need for renal replacement therapy.
